results.description: Man City boss Pep Guardiola praises the courage of defender Kyle Walker who ended up playing in goal for the final minutes of their Champions League game against Atalanta.
results.shortTitle: Guardiola praises Walker's courage after stint in goal
results.title: Champions League: Pep Guardiola praises Kyle Walker's courage after stint in goal

thumbnail.altText: Kyle Walker is congratulated by Pep Guardiola

results.description: Who doesn't love to see an outfield player in goal? Kyle Walker stole the show in Milan by going in goal for Manchester City.
results.shortTitle: Man City's new number one? Walker dons the gloves
results.title: Man City's new number one? Kyle Walker dons the gloves in Atalanta draw

results.description: How teenage Brazilian forward Rodrygo earned comparisons with Raul and Neymar as he scored a 'perfect' hat-trick for Real Madrid.
results.shortTitle: The 'new Neymar' who scored perfect hat-trick
results.title: How 'new Neymar' Rodrygo announced himself with 'perfect' hat-trick

results.description: Bayern Munich, Juventus and Paris St-Germain qualify for the Champions League knockout stage but who else can still go through?
results.shortTitle: Who needs what in Champions League?
results.title: Champions League permutations: Who is through and who can still progress?
Walker goes in goal as Man City draw

results.description: Paris St-Germain book their place in the last 16 of the Champions League with a narrow victory over Club Bruges in Group A.
results.shortTitle: PSG maintain perfect start to progress
results.title: Paris St-Germain 1-0 Club Bruges: French champions maintain perfect start to qualify

results.description: Bayern Munich qualify for the Champions League knockout stage as Robert Lewandowski's goal helps them beat Olympiakos.
results.shortTitle: Bayern beat Olympiakos to reach last 16
results.title: Bayern Munich 2-0 Olympiakos: Robert Lewandowski helps seal last-16 spot

results.description: Juventus miss the chance to seal their place in the last 16 of the Champions League after being held to a draw by Lokomotiv Moscow.
results.title: Lokomotiv Moscow 1-2 Juventus: Italian champions score injury-time winner to reach last 16

results.description: Frank Lampard says Chelsea were "sloppy" but he loved the spirit they showed in their comeback from 4-1 down to draw 4-4 against Ajax in the Champions League.
results.title: Frank Lampard loved spirit in Chelsea comeback against Ajax

results.description: The Champions League involves some of best players in the world - with plenty of goals being scored as a result. Can you name the competition's top scorers?
results.shortTitle: Quiz: Name the Champions League's top scorers
results.title: Champions League quiz: Can you name the top goalscorers?

results.description: Jrgen Klopp says "we cannot carry on like this" after it was decided his Liverpool side will play two games in the space of 24 hours in December.
results.shortTitle: We cannot carry on like this - Klopp
results.title: Jrgen Klopp: Liverpool manager says 'we cannot carry on like this' over fixture congestion

results.description: Chelsea come back from 4-1 down to draw a Champions League thriller against an Ajax side who have two men sent off.
results.shortTitle: Chelsea fight back to draw thriller
results.title: Chelsea 4-4 Ajax: Champions League thriller ends in stunning draw

results.description: Eight goals, two red cards, two penalties, two own goals, another VAR intervention and a point each - the Champions League delivers again.
results.shortTitle: 'I don't think I've seen a game like it'
results.title: Chelsea 4-4 Ajax: Frank Lampard says Champions League game 'right up there'

results.description: Slavia Prague keeper Ondrej Kolar produces an inspired display as Barcelona fail to score for the first time in 46 home games.
results.shortTitle: Slavia Prague frustrate Barca at Nou Camp
results.title: Barcelona 0-0 Slavia Prague: Hosts frustrated in Champions League

results.description: Achraf Hakimi scores two second-half goals as Borussia Dortmund overturn a two-goal deficit to beat Inter Milan in a thriller at the Westfalenstadion.
results.shortTitle: Dortmund fight back to beat Inter
results.title: Borussia Dortmund 3-2 Inter Milan: Achraf Hakimi double hands Germans win

results.description: Liverpool go top of Group E in the Champions League with victory over Belgian side Genk at Anfield.
results.shortTitle: Liverpool beat Genk to go top of group
results.title: Liverpool 2-1 Genk: Reds go top of Champions League group with win

thumbnail.altText: Georginio Wijnaldum and Virgil van Dijk celebrate

results.description: Teenager Erling Haaland scores again for Red Bull Salzburg, preventing Napoli from becoming the first team to qualify for the last 16 of the Champions League.
results.shortTitle: Haaland scores as Salzburg hold Napoli
results.title: Napoli 1-1 Red Bull Salzburg: Erling Haaland scores as Napoli held to draw

results.description: Tottenham players will not face any racism against Red Star Belgrade, says the Serb side's boss Vladan Milojevic.
results.shortTitle: Spurs won't face racism - Red Star boss
results.title: Tottenham will face no racism in Belgrade, says Red Star boss Vladan Milojevic
